entity.group

Class Group<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.group.Group<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimalGroup, PlantGroup

    public class Group<T extends Entity>
extends Entity
    The Class Group defines an encapsulation of an aggregation of entities.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
